definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Cast the aluminium alloy outer cover , gushes out and moulds on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 铸铝合金外壳压制成型，表面喷塑。

sentences.english: These constructional coercions account for the reversibility restrictions of some S-O reversible sentences.
sentences.chinese: 这些构式压制为易位的限制条件和原因提供了解释。

sentences.english: No teacher shall stamp on a child's idea without considering it.
sentences.chinese: 老师不应该不加考虑就把孩子的想法压制下去。

sentences.english: After I did the drive-through, I got stuck behind Fernando (Alonso).
sentences.chinese: 我做了处罚后，我被压制在了阿隆索后面。

sentences.english: The most odious of all oppressions are those which mask as justice.
sentences.chinese: 最可憎的压制总是戴着正义的面具。

sentences.english: I highly recommend laminating your perforated film with a premium optically clear film laminate.
sentences.chinese: 我强烈建议将穿孔贴膜用优质光学层压制件卷成薄片。

sentences.english: For some, the pleasurable sensations override the terrifying images on the movie screen.
sentences.chinese: 对于有些人来说，愉悦感压制住了影像带来的恐惧。

sentences.english: What is called bad women is only the pressure and distortion of patriarchal society to female personality.
sentences.chinese: 所谓“恶妇”只是男权社会对女性个性的压制与扭曲。

sentences.english: To seek to extinguish anger utterly, is but a bravery of the stoics.
sentences.chinese: 企图完全压制住愤怒只不过是禁欲者的勇敢表现之一。

sentences.english: After Sir Thomas comes back, he tries to control the Crawfords' force.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯爵士归来后，对克劳福特的气焰有所压制。

sentences.english: Soames made a tour of the room, to subdue his rising anger .
sentences.chinese: 索米斯在屋内兜了一圈，压制一下心头升起的怒火。

sentences.english: In effect, the gene for that protein had been silenced.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，产生这种蛋白质的基因被压制了。

sentences.english: Now, China wants to tamp such nationalism down.
sentences.chinese: 现在，中国希望压制民族主义。

sentences.english: The second feature of this setup is the interaction of pain suppression and Shamanistic rage.
sentences.chinese: 第二个好处是痛苦压制和萨满之怒的配合使用。

sentences.english: The relative bodhicitta thought only suppresses self-clinging, so that the defilements become inactive.
sentences.chinese: 世俗菩提心只是通过压制我执而暂时克制染污习气。

sentences.english: And this dumbing down bodes ill for the nation's future.
sentences.chinese: 这种压制对国家的未来预示着凶兆。

definition: to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to counterattack/to come back after a defeat/to retrieve lost ground
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
